main.title: Main
main.title1text: Handmade, individual approach, and jewelry that speaks louder than words. Submit your request, and we will bring your idea to life in a unique form.
main.text: Since 2010, we have been creating meaningful products — for engagements, gifts, memories , and yourself.

cont.p: You can find us in our store-workshop, call us or write to us via messenger.

sec9.e3: Select a convenient way to contact you

sec2.title: Jewelry
sec2.text: We are a family workshop with a history that began in 2011. Father and son turned a small workshop into a brand known for its quality, trust, and aesthetics.
sec2.text1: Each piece contains not only precious materials, but also meaning that weighs more.

services.text1: We create jewelry according to our design, as well as according to your motives. We specialize separately in diamonds, colored stones.

p.p7: In addition to the workshop, we have a physical store where you can try on jewelry, get advice, discuss custom orders, or pick up finished products.
p.p8: Genuine emotions of customers whom we have helped to preserve or create something important.
p.p9: Submit your request and we will contact you

aU.p1: This is a family business that started in a small workshop in 2011.
aU.p2: Father and son combined their experience and passion for jewelry — and in 2013 our brand and first store appeared.
aU.p3: We have been working since 2010, officially since 2013. We create jewelry that is not only made of gold and stones, but also has meaning.
aU.h1: We are the ones who create
aU.p4: Our team consists of experienced jewelers, young designers, technologists, and those responsible for service and communication.
aU.p5: Each product passes through the hands of several people — and each one puts a part of themselves into it.
aU.p6: We work by hand, using modern tools, but the main thing is vision and a sense of form.
aU.p7: We don't just create products — we help preserve moments, memories, and feelings.
aU.p8: It could be a gift, a proposal, a memory, or just a dream.
aU.p9: And we are always there to make it come true.
aU.p10: Leave a request and we will contact you
aU.p12: And we are always here to make it a reality.

se.p1: With respect for detail and meaning, we create
se.p2: restore and repair jewelry that matters.
se.p3: We create meaningful pieces — for engagements, gifts, memories, or just for yourself. You come with an idea, we bring it to life in metal and stone.
se.p4: We discuss the shape, proportions, metal color, and stone type
se.p5: The jeweler prepares a personalized estimate. This takes 1–2 days
se.p7: The process takes 7–20 days — depending on the complexity.
se.p7.2: The finished jewelry can be picked up at the workshop or received
se.p8: We service all products free of charge. If necessary,
se.h3s: of jewelry with an important history,
se.p9: Some jewelry is not just metal and stones. They are memories, gifts, and heirlooms. We carefully restore such items, preserving their form, meaning, and character.
se.p10: We service all jewelry made by us free of charge (unless changes in design or size are required).
se.p10.2: If something gets damaged over time, we are always ready to restore it.

pp.p1: Handcrafted with respect for every detail.
pp.p2: Can be made in white, rose, or yellow gold
pp.p3: Can be adapted for other inserts (upon request)
pp.p4: Can be made from your own gold
pp.p6: We will create this piece of jewelry just for you. Leave a request — we will contact you to clarify the details, select the size and materials.
pp.p7: Free service for all products manufactured by us
pp.p7.1: If the product needs repair — we will always help

rev.p1: It is important to us not only what we create, but also how you feel about it. Thank you to everyone who shares their thoughts after receiving their jewelry.

an.q1: How much does it cost to make jewelry?
an.a1: The cost depends on the complexity, metal, type of stone, and size. We always prepare an individual estimate.
an.q2: Can you make jewelry from my gold?
an.a2: Our products are not mass-produced. Each piece of jewelry is handmade by an experienced craftsman.
an.q3: Can I see the manufacturing process?
an.a3: Of course! We will be happy to show you how our products are made. You can visit our workshop or view photos and videos of the manufacturing process on the 'How we work' page.
an.q4: What if I don't know which stone to choose?
an.a4: Don't worry if you don't know which stone is right for you! We will help you choose the perfect option that suits you in terms of color, energy, and style.
an.q5: How long does it take to make?
an.a5: The production of jewelry usually takes 2 to 4 weeks, depending on the complexity of the work, the availability of materials, and the workload of the workshop.

car.p: Transparently. Carefully. With respect for every detail.
car.p2.1: We discuss the idea. You can visit our workshop or talk to us on the phone.
car.p2.2: The master prepares an accurate cost estimate, taking into account all your wishes. This takes 1-2 days.
car.p2.3: Once the price is approved, we start working.
car.p2.4: It takes 7–20 days to create a piece of jewelry, depending on its complexity.
car.p2.5: You can pick up your jewelry in person or have it delivered by mail.
car.p2.6: We provide free service for all the items we have created.
car.p3: Our products are not mass-produced. Each piece of jewelry
car.p3.br: is handmade by an experienced craftsman.
car.p3.1: We work with diamonds, sapphires, emeralds,
car.p3.1.br: tourmalines, pearls, and other precious stones.
car.p3.2: We use modern technology, but the foundation is
car.p4: We don't just sell jewelry — we create products for which we are responsible.
car.h5: We service all jewelry made by us free of charge
car.h5.1: If your jewelry needs repair, please contact us at any time.
car.h5.2: If you have your own gold, we can use it, and you only pay for the work.
